data.text: @Covid19Critical Even though it's good news. For those who recommend vaccine, the existence of curable medicines means their death penalty. By the way,do you have any objections to the article that the Pfizer vaccine trial resulted in many casualties?　https://t.co/3W6IfpjjgU
@Covid19Critical Common sense that early treatment for any illness is the only way to go!  Why that didn't happen as a rule for this virus is reprehensible.
@Covid19Critical UnVaccinated status has killed so many, needlessly.
@Covid19Critical My loved one had to go to the er for an anaphylactic reaction likely from your protocol…black seed oil.

@Covid19Critical Your take on US tech, patented by Moderna in 2016, discovered in the COVID-19 virus?

-Lecture: how Moderna's DNA sequence makes bat virus gain function to infect humans: https://t.co/COAquRknqh

-Story of scientists finding Moderna tech in COVID-19 virus:
https://t.co/T3vKajLmU1

@Covid19Critical DNA sequencing reveals the blueprint for building an organism, & no understanding of genetic function or evolution could be complete without this info. 

The main DNA sequence difference between COVID's virus & its closest bat virus was a DNA sequence patented by Moderna in 2016.

@dietcheese @Covid19Critical My mother, 87 year old retired RN. She had C19 a month ago. She had over 102F temp. She was already on vit.C,D,zinc and added doxycycline, and hcq. Doctor added rx'd ivermectin which she started on day 3 but honestly w/in 24h of 1st hcq dose she had no fever & mild symptoms
